tasks.task_description: Install RDP server for Wayland (xrdp or gnome-remote-desktop)

description: Set up remote desktop access to Wayland session from MacBook
context: Installed and configured GNOME Remote Desktop for Wayland. Service is enabled and started.
RDP service is running successfully on port 3389. Firewall port opened. RDP server is active and ready for connections.
RDP setup complete. MacBook can now connect to Ubuntu Wayland session via Microsoft Remote Desktop app or rdp://192.168.1.12
